snippet: The Los Angeles police chief and his department’s independent watchdog have found that a fatal close-range shooting of a 25-year-old black man by officers last year was justified, a department source said.
abstract: Los Angeles Police Chief Charlie Beck and inspector general find police officer was justified in shooting black man Ezell Ford in August 2014; findings are only recommendations to Police Commission and hearing is still needed to determine justification of event.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles police chief and his department’s independent watchdog have found that a fatal close-range shooting of a 25-year-old black man by officers last year was justified, a department source said.

headline.main: Los Angeles Chief Finds Killing by Police Was Lawful
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Chief Finds Killing by Police Was Lawful
